FuncDef: This command moves a local file, system file, or a directory. If the target already exists, the command fails and an error message displays.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the file or directory to be moved. Values-file url|local-url | remote-url: 255 chars max, local-url|[cflash-id/][file-path] 200 chars max, including cflash-id directory length 99 chars max each, , remote-url |[{ftp:// | tftp://}login:pswd@remote-locn/][file-path], |247 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |[hostname | ipv4-address | "["ipv6-address"]"], ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses 255 , cflash-id |cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.

The new destination to place the old-file-url. Values-file url|local-url | remote-url: 255 chars max, local-url|[cflash-id/][file-path] 200 chars max, including cflash-id directory length 99 chars max each, , remote-url |[{ftp:// | tftp://}login:pswd@remote-locn/][file-path], |247 chars max, |directory length 99 chars max each, remote-locn |[hostname | ipv4-address | "["ipv6-address"]"], ipv4-address |a.b.c.d, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D, |interface - 32 chars max, for link local addresses 255 , cflash-id |cf1:, cf1-A:, cf1-B:, cf2:, cf2-A:, cf2-B:, cf3:, cf3-A:, cf3-B:.
Forces an immediate move of the specified file(s).
